title: 服务器玩着玩着就重启了，求大神解答
author: KeLe_Feng
txt_content:
如题：
下面是后台错误报告
11.06 18:04:47 [Multicraft] Server shut down (running)11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO # /tmp/jvm-80995/hs_error.log11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 1853358080 bytes for committing reserved memory.11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO #11.06 18:04:46 [Server] INFO OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x00007f49bca80000, 1853358080, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)

replies.author: MC_弱者
replies.txt_content: 应该是内存过大，建议你更改一下自己启动器的内存推荐在520~1024之间

replies.author: KeLe_Feng
replies.txt_content:
MC_弱者 发表于 2016-6-12 10:22
应该是内存过大，建议你更改一下自己启动器的内存推荐在520~1024之间
我这个是面板服，内存要官方哪里调，内存大也不行啊。才35G的。。。。。。
